snippet.title: Swift: Magical Grid to Tinder (Ep 1)
snippet.description:
Creating a nice Tinder swipe style animation can be tricky if you don't understand the basics of detecting touches.  In today's video, I'll go over a fun and easy exercise to show you how touches work and how they can be captured.  By the end of this mini series, you'll have a much better idea on how to create the swiping behavior of dating applications.
